title: What is it?
text: Crystal Nodes (CN) is an addon for the 3D modelling & animation program Blender that enables easy creation of crystals illustrations. CN is focused on providing tools for providing Crystallography illustrations and it is not (for now) a computational tool for calculating inorganic structures

title: What is it?
text:
Features:

generic tools for creating a basic grain form (extended primitives nodeand nodes for non isometric crystal system)
tools for instancing grains according to the most common growth patter (radiating, plumose, parallel, granular, felted, foliated )
tools for creating h,k,l planes, extruding faces, mirroring faces and to instance objs accoring to bravais translation
